original_text:
That person is like a tree planted by streams of water,
    which yields its fruit in season
and whose leaf does not wither—
    whatever they do prospers.
korean_text: 그는 시냇가에 심은 나무가 철을 따라 열매를 맺으며 그 잎사귀가 마르지 아니함 같으니 그가 하는 모든 일이 다 형통하리로다

sentences.original_text: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 시냇가에 심겨진 나무와 같다

sentences.original_text: which yields its fruit in season
and whose leaf does not wither
